name: Drag & Drop
description: Drag and drop objects either by mouse or touch.

conditions.name: Is dragging
conditions.description: True if the object is currently being dragged.

conditions.name: On drag start
conditions.description: Triggered when the object begins to be dragged.

conditions.name: On drop
conditions.description: Triggered when the object is dropped (the drag stops).

conditions.name: Is enabled
conditions.description: True if the behavior is enabled.

actions.name: Set enabled
actions.description: Enable or disable the drag and drop behavior.

params.name: State
params.description: Choose whether to enable or disable the behavior.

actions.name: Drop
actions.description: If currently being dragged, force the object to be dropped.

actions.name: Set axes
actions.description: Set which ways the object can be dragged.

params.name: Axes
params.description: The ways in which the object can be dragged.
